rules_text:
Vinehide Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Reborn X–{X}{G}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with X additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
notes:
2k17
Outlast G > Reborn X—XGGG
Uncommon > Rare
